feed.title: Disorganized Behavior
feed.subtitle: A blog about social, behavioral, and information sciences

entry.title: Hello world!
entry.content: Hi. Welcome to Disorganized Behavior, a blog about social, behavioral, and information science. Among other things, I will discuss recent scientific research and share techniques for data analytics. I hope you find something interesting to read!
entry.summary: Hi. Welcome to Disorganized Behavior, a blog about social, behavioral, and information science. Among other things, I will discuss recent scientific research and share techniques for data analytics. I hope you find something interesting to read!
